name: Thalassonauts
description:
Conserve oxygen and try to get as deep as you can!

This is my entry for Godot Wild Jam #41

Theme: Ocean

This is the first game jam I've ever participated in and also the first time I've made an actual game with Godot, so thank you for taking a look at it!

Controls

All controls can be remapped from the options menu.

ActionKeyboard Control
Gamepad Control
Move LeftALeft stick (left)
Move Right
DLeft stick (right)
JumpSpaceA (Xbox) / B (Nintendo)
Known Issues
  • You may have to use mouse or keyboard to enable fullscreen. I believe this is due to how some browsers work with fullscreen.
  • Some gamepad  mappings may behave strangely depending on your brand of controller/browser. I believe this depends on the level of support each browser vendor has for different gamepads.
Notes

Native builds are provided in case the web version doesn't run well for you.
